Uses of Interface
org.restlet.data.Data

Packages that use Data
org.restlet.data Elements of information handled by a component via a connector. 
 

Uses of Data in org.restlet.data
 

Subinterfaces of Data in org.restlet.data
 interface CharacterSet
          Character set used to encode characters representations.
 interface ControlData
          Definition of the purpose of a message between components.
 interface Cookie
          Cookie received from a user agent.
 interface CookieSetting
          Cookie to set in a user agent.
 interface Form
          Submission form containing a list of parameters.
 interface Language
          Language used in representations.
 interface MediaType
          The data format of a representation.
 interface Metadata
          Description of data contained in a resource representation.
 interface Method
          Method to execute when handling a uniform call.
 interface Parameter
          Multi-usage parameter.
 interface Preference
          Metadata preference definition.
 interface Reference
          Represents a reference to a uniform resource identifier (URI).
 interface Representation
          Current or intended state of a resource.
 interface RepresentationMetadata
          Metadata describing a representation.
 interface Status
          Status to return after handling a uniform call.
 interface Tag
          Validation tag equivalent to the HTTP entity tag.
 

Classes in org.restlet.data that implement Data

          Abstract resource representation.

          Enumeration of common character sets.

          Default representation metadata implementation.

          Default empty value implementation.

          Language used in representations.
 class MediaTypes
          The data format of a representation.
 class Methods
          Enumeration of call methods.
 class Statuses
          Enumeration of call status.
